Body:
value = '1'
app.app.mount.setting.statusRefraction = value
app.updateSetStatGUI(app.app.mount.setting)
assert 'ON' == app.ui.statusRefraction.text()
value = None
app.app.mount.setting.statusRefraction = value
app.updateSetStatGUI(app.app.mount.setting)
assert 'OFF' == app.ui.statusRefraction.text()
